faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and process

items.question: What technologies do you use for web development?
items.answer: We use modern technologies like React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for frontend development. For backend, we utilize Node.js, Python, and various cloud services. Our tech stack is always up-to-date with industry standards.

items.question: How do you ensure website security?
items.answer:
We implement multiple layers of security including:

‚Ä¢ SSL certificates and HTTPS
‚Ä¢ Secure authentication systems
‚Ä¢ Data encryption at rest and in transit
‚Ä¢ Regular security audits
‚Ä¢ Protection against XSS, CSRF, SQL injection
‚Ä¢ Continuous security monitoring
‚Ä¢ Regular security updates

items.question: What is your development process?
items.answer:
Our agile development process includes:

1. Requirements gathering and analysis
2. UI/UX design and prototyping
3. Iterative development with regular client feedback
4. Thorough testing and QA
5. Deployment and optimization
6. Post-launch support and maintenance

items.question: Do you provide SEO optimization?
items.answer:
Yes, we implement comprehensive SEO strategies including:

‚Ä¢ Technical SEO optimization
‚Ä¢ Meta tags and schema markup
‚Ä¢ Performance optimization
‚Ä¢ Mobile responsiveness
‚Ä¢ Content optimization
‚Ä¢ Regular SEO audits and reports

items.question: What kind of support do you offer after launch?
items.answer:
We offer flexible support packages including:

‚Ä¢ 24/7 technical support
‚Ä¢ Regular maintenance updates
‚Ä¢ Performance monitoring
‚Ä¢ Security patches
‚Ä¢ Content updates
‚Ä¢ Feature enhancements

Support plans can be customized based on your needs.

items.question: How do you handle project pricing?
items.answer:
We offer transparent pricing based on project scope and requirements. Each project is unique, so we provide detailed quotes after understanding your specific needs. We also offer:

‚Ä¢ Flexible payment plans
‚Ä¢ Milestone-based payments
‚Ä¢ Clear project timelines
‚Ä¢ No hidden costs
